name: Triangle Command
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 40 Compo within ~8 hours. The theme was 'The more you have, the worse it is'.

More info on my blog: http://backyard-dev.de/ludum-dare/ld40/

Welcome Pilot!

Dodge the obstacles by using the [up & down arrows] or [w/s]. 

Collect the energy pellets by shooting at them with [l-ctrl] or [left mouse]. This will make you faster and also increases your score faster!

If you are going too fast, dump an energy pellet using the [space] key.

Good luck. 

You are our only hope...
